NOTES: pH and temperature not specified in the publication, 0.05 mM TDP-3-dimethylamino-4,6-dideoxy-alpha-D-glucopyranose

pH 8.0, 25C, in the presence og 0.001 mM EryC and 1 mM of each substrate, more than 300 turnovers are observed in 2.5 min, indicating that the kcat must be greater than 100/min. This is one of the highest turnover numbers reported for an antibiotic glycosyl transferase
